## Creating Repo
### Goal:
Create a public repo

### Needs:
Nouns: GitHub Desktop app
Verbs: NA

### Steps:
1. Created a Repo with an appropriate title
2. Created a branch called Requirements
3. Copied Activity 14 from the original folder and pasted it into this folder
4. Created a README.md file
5. Create issues (at least 2)
   a. #1 = Add a plan
   b. #2 = Upload Activity 14 Final Quarto Document
   c. #3 = Lint Activity 14
6. Create commits (as each task is completed)
   a. Editing the README
   b. Creating a new R script file to lint Activity 14
   c. Commiting the changes from Activity 14 to GitHub
   d. Updating R History
7. Creating pull requests
   a. Each commit has to have an associating pull request to bring it to the main branch
